title: Can't Create Discussion
body: II'm sure this comes up a lot, but I am level 30 and yet my profile on the board says that I am level 5. How should I fix this? Thanks!

replies.body: Creating this post on H&S actually fixed this for you! When you don't use the boards often, your Boards and Summoner profiles fall out of sync, so a post like this actually causes a sync to occur. Happy posting!
